product_name: E-Case iSeries iPod nano Case - 2013 Closeout
long_description: With its sleek 4-pole headphone jack, you can run a little faster or ski a little harder with the music pumping no matter the conditions, thanks to the waterproof E-Case iSeries iPod nano case. Ultra-thin and waterproof, it provides full access to your device, and the dual-track SealLock(TM) zipper is guaranteed to seal out water and dirt. Integrated, waterproof 4-pole headphone jack is compatible with remote controls on headphone cables. Model-specific, high-clarity windows allow direct access to touch screen functions. Every case is individually tested to meet IPX7 standard of withstanding submersion in 1m of water for 30 min. PVC-free materials and UV-resistant windows. Die-cut lash points for tethering. E-Case iSeries iPod nano Case fits all generations of iPod nano devices. Closeout.
short_description: With its sleek 4-pole headphone jack, you can run a little faster or ski a little harder with the music pumping no matter the conditions, thanks to the waterproof E-Case iSeries iPod nano case.
